mapper.select: SELECT tlc.id, tlc.score, tlc.context, tlc.gmt_create, course.`name` AS courseName, customer.`name` AS customerName, course.`id` as courseId FROM `trial_lesson_comment` tlc left join trial_lesson tl on tlc.trial_id = tl.id LEFT JOIN `course` ON tl.course_id = course.`id` LEFT JOIN `customer` ON customer.`id` = tlc.customer_id
